ace.interfaces

Interface ExceptionsHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DirectoryListener, GlobalExceptionHandler, Jar, LocalExceptionHandler, ReflectionPropertyHelper, Sandboxed

    public interface ExceptionsHandler
    This is the interface of the added-value exceptions handling mechanism provided by Ace.
